entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 09, 2024

summary.caption: “Okay, okay, little Ahab. … Which one is it going to be?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for April 09, 2024

summary.caption: “This is it, Jenkins—indisputable proof that the Ice Age caught these people completely off guard.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for April 09, 2024

summary.caption: “New guy, huh? Well, up here, you walk the edge! And the edge is a fickle hellcat. … Love her, but never trust her, for her heart is full of lye!”
